conversation_history.content: I can set a reminder for you. Would you like me to send a notification to your phone or calendar at a specific time?
Hi John, I've noted that you'd like to be reminded to call your mom. Would you like me to suggest a time or just keep it in your system for now?
I had a terrible headache this morning
Sorry to hear that, John. Hopefully, you're feeling better now. Would you like some suggestions for relaxation techniques or over-the-counter pain relief options to help with headaches in the future?
Broccoli can be a bit of a turn-off for some people. Would you like some recipe suggestions for dishes that feature other vegetables instead?
I have a dentist appointment next Tuesday at 10 AM

John, I've got that reminder for you. Don't forget about your dentist appointment next Tuesday at 10 AM. Would you like me to send you a notification the day before or at a specific time leading up to it?
